experience.institution: University of Washington College of Education
experience.responsibilities: Conducted primary research on the impact of inquiry-based learning models on student retention in secondary science education. Published findings on pedagogical strategies for diverse learning environments.
Applied evidence-based teaching methodologies from research background to manage classrooms of 30+ students. Developed and delivered lesson plans in Physics and Chemistry aligned with NGSS standards.
Assisted in evaluating the effectiveness of digital literacy programs across district high schools. Compiled data sets to support state-level recommendations for STEM curriculum updates.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
